```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```


## Speed as miles per hour

```{r}
flights %>% 
  mutate(mph_speed = ...) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(...))
```


```{r}
flights %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(...))
```

## Speed distributions

```{r}
flights %>%
  mutate(Delayed = ...) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(..., ..., color = ...))
```


```{r}
flights %>%
  mutate(Delayed = ...) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(..., ...)) +
  facet_wrap(~Delayed)
```

# Deviation from average departure delay

```{r}
flights %>% 
  mutate(dev = dep_delay - mean(dep_delay)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_violin(aes(..., ...))
```
